00026 var Scriptaculous = {
00027   Version: '1.8.1',
00028   require: function(libraryName) {
00029     // inserting via DOM fails in Safari 2.0, so brute force approach
00030     document.write('<script type="text/javascript" src="'+libraryName+'"><\/script>');
00031   },
00032   REQUIRED_PROTOTYPE: '1.6.0',
00033   load: function() {
00034     function convertVersionString(versionString){
00035       var r = versionString.split('.');
00036       return parseInt(r[0])*100000 + parseInt(r[1])*1000 + parseInt(r[2]);
00037     }
00038  
00039     if((typeof Prototype=='undefined') || 
00040        (typeof Element == 'undefined') || 
00041        (typeof Element.Methods=='undefined') ||
00042        (convertVersionString(Prototype.Version) < 
00043         convertVersionString(Scriptaculous.REQUIRED_PROTOTYPE)))
00044        throw("script.aculo.us requires the Prototype JavaScript framework >= " +
00045         Scriptaculous.REQUIRED_PROTOTYPE);
00046     
00047     $A(document.getElementsByTagName("script")).findAll( function(s) {
00048       return (s.src && s.src.match(/scriptaculous\.js(\?.*)?$/))
00049     }).each( function(s) {
00050       var path = s.src.replace(/scriptaculous\.js(\?.*)?$/,'');
00051       var includes = s.src.match(/\?.*load=([a-z,]*)/);
00052       (includes ? includes[1] : 'builder,effects,dragdrop,controls,slider,sound').split(',').each(
00053        function(include) { Scriptaculous.require(path+include+'.js') });
00054     });
00055   }
00056 }
00057 
00058 Scriptaculous.load();
